tests.test_name: Moving the device triggers a sound
tests.test_description: Whenever the device is moved, a sound is emitted by it.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Move the SportShield development board.
Listen for any sound emitted by the device's buzzer.

tests.expected_result: The buzzer should emit either a 3-tone sound or a 5-tone sound.

tests.test_description: When slightly moved for less than one second, SportShield emits a 3-tone sound

steps_to_follow.step_description: Move the SportShield development board of 5 centimeters in less than one second.
Listen for any sound emitted by the device's buzzer.

tests.expected_result: The buzzer should emit a 3-tone sound.

tests.test_description: If the lock detects a major move for less than 1 second, it triggers a 5-tone sound.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Move the SportShield development board of 50 centimeters in less than one second.
Listen for any sound emitted by the device's buzzer.

tests.expected_result: The buzzer should emit a 5-tone sound.

tests.test_description: If the lock is moved one second or more in anti-thief mode, it triggers a 5-tone sound.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Move the SportShield development board for 5 seconds.
Listen for a 5-tone sound emitted by the buzzer of the board.

tests.expected_result: The buzzer should emit a 5-tone sound.

tests.test_description: The sound of a 5-tone sound is twice more loud than the 3-tone one

steps_to_follow.step_description: Ensure the anti-theft device is not in deep sleep mode and enable Phyphox on the "Audio Amplitude" tab.
Move the SportShield development board of 5 centimeters in less than one second.
Note down the maximum value displayed on the chart.
Reset the activity chart in Phyphox application using the "Clear History" button.
Move the SportShield development board for 5 seconds.
Note down the maximum value displayed on the chart.
Comapre if the second sound level is equal or greater than the first sound level + 10dB.

tests.expected_result: The sound level of the second phase should be at least greater of 10dB compared to the first phase one.

tests.test_name: Eco-mode - The lock cannot be locked back
tests.test_description: When the anti-thief device is in eco-mode, it cannot be locked if it wasn't.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Check if the eco-mode is enabled by checking if a "SportShield 5" Bluetooth device is available.
If you see one, wait until the battery level is lower than or equal to 15%
If you don't see one, unlock the device by submitting the value 0x1 the "Unlock" Bluetooth field.

tests.expected_result: The value you can then read in the field "Unlock" stays 0x1, indicating the lock will stay in an unlock state.

tests.test_name: Eco-mode - The lock can be unlocked via NFC
tests.test_description: When the anti-thief device is in eco-mode, it can be unlocked using the linked NFC card/phone.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Check if the eco-mode is enabled by checking if a "SportShield 5" Bluetooth device is available.
If you see one, wait until the battery level is lower than or equal to 15%
If you don't see one, bring the Iphone close to the NFC reader of the SportShield development board.

tests.expected_result: The anti-thief device should be unlocked and the electromagnet should be active.

tests.test_name: Sleep mode - The lock cannot be locked back
tests.test_description: When the anti-thief device is in sleep mode, it cannot be locked if it wasn't.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Check if the sleep mode is enabled by checking if a "SportShield 5" Bluetooth device is available and by bringing the phone close to the NFC reader.
If you see a device named "SportShield 5", or the lock is unlocked via NFC, go on LightBlue and submit the value 0x1 in the "Sleep Mode 5" field.
To ensure deep sleep mode is not switched on, move the device in different directions and ensure a sound is emitted.
If the two previous steps were validated, unlock the device by submitting the value 0x1 the "Unlock" Bluetooth field.

tests.expected_result: The value you can then read in the field "Unlock" stays 0x1, indicating the lock will stay in an unlock state.

tests.test_name: Sleep mode - The lock cannot be unlocked
tests.test_description: When the anti-thief device is in sleep mode, it cannot be unlocked.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Check if the sleep mode is enabled by checking if a "SportShield 5" Bluetooth device is available and by bringing the phone close to the NFC reader.
If you see a device named "SportShield 5", or the lock is unlocked via NFC, go on LightBlue and submit the value 0x1 in the "Sleep Mode 5" field.
To ensure deep sleep mode is not switched on, move the device in different directions and ensure a sound is emitted.
Try to access via Bluetooth to the device. You shouldn't be able to access it and find it on LightBlue app.
Bring the phone close to the board NFC reader.

tests.expected_result: Nothing should happen, the lock shouldn't be unlocking.

tests.test_name: Deep sleep mode - The lock must be locked
tests.test_description: Deep sleep mode can only be enabled if the anti-thief device is in a lock state.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Check if a "SportShield 5" Bluetooth device is available
Submit the value 0x1 in the "Unlock field"
Try to submit the value 0x1 in the "Deep Sleep Mode" field. The value should instantly reswitch to 0x0
Submit the value 0x0 in the "Unlock field"
Try to submit the value 0x1 in the "Deep Sleep Mode" field.

tests.expected_result: The value should instantly reswitch to 0x0. When moving the device, it should not emit any sound.

tests.test_name: Deep sleep mode - The lock cannot be unlocked

tests.expected_result: Nothing should happen, the lock shouldn't be unlocking.

tests.test_name: Battery lasts 7 days in normal conditions
tests.test_description: The autonomy of the device is tested at a normal temperature conditions to ensure it can least at least 7 days.

steps_to_follow.step_description: Leave the development board in a room at room temperature for 2 hours.
Plug back the development board to the GitHub Actions host computer.
Check the console to see the percentage of battery left and enter it in the Python script to know if SportShield would last one week.

tests.expected_result: The battery should last at least 7 days.

Take the development board out of the freezer and plug it to the GitHub Actions host computer
Check the console to see the percentage of battery left and enter it in the Python script to know if SportShield would last one week.

tests.expected_result: The battery should last at least 7 days.
